name: Sussy Baka Dating Sim (Barely Functional)
description:
This is an abomination.

Made in around 2 hours for a joke.

It's incredibly bad and incredibly bare bones. Also barely functional.

It was originally supposed to have Among Us Drip in the background but it wasn't working. So just play that in a bg tab.

This is mainly just for my friends.

I'm never going to touch this again.
